product_name: NESCAFÉ Classic Coffee, 100g Dawn Jar: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: If you like your coffee to be as awful as your spouse
reviews.review_body: Here’s a PSA. This is not coffee. This is undoubtedly poison. Nescafe does a terrific job in selling solidified stool water and passing it off as coffee. Disgusting, foul and appalling. Just like my wife.

Hello Guys...So I am not a very experienced coffee taster or something but I drink coffee sometimes, actually many times a week... I ordered this coffee a & decided to try it later as I didn't have much free time... A few days passed & one day I decided to try this coffee... The moment I put this coffee in my hot milk, the aroma it made me feel that its going to be really good... And it did came out to be very nice coffee... The flavor & the aroma was simply awesome...I was actually consuming coffee from BRU till now & I can pretty confidently tell you that its way much better than it... Nescafe is the Best... And I'm pretty sure I'll be permanently sticking to Nescafe now on...Some guys might think I am talking very basic & obvious stuff but as I told, I actually not am a coffee enthusiast... I have not tasted all the great coffee types in world & also don't have any idea about premium coffee stuff & like... I just drink coffee sometimes coz I like its taste... I can say coffee is one of my favorite drinks...And if you are new to coffee, a beginner willing to tryout this wonderful drink... I would assure you that Nescafe is Best...

reviews.review_title: Not deep roasted unlike Bru Gold
reviews.review_body: Using from almost a decade tried several brands but economically it's a great choice. It's not deep roasted if you want deeply roasted go for Bru Gold, that's perfect.

I dislike that product and I refuse and cancelled your products. It was very nearer expire date. Today also I tried to place an order for Nescafe 500 gms pouch packing worth Rs. 950/- , But when I place the order there was shown delivery charges Rs. 50/- . When I am ordering 950/- Rs. and why I pay delivery charge ? So I have not order to Amazon.My last 3 experience are not good. And that is why I am not interested.Also I had order for door mat also but that product was quiet rough. It was not accepted. I had thrown all mats.RegdsShirish Shah.Ahmedabad.+91 9824038039

reviews.review_title: NOTHING LIKE THIS FOR A THE COFFEE ADDICTS
reviews.review_body: NOTHING LIKE THIS FOR A THE COFFEE ADDICTSGREAT AROMA AND SEALED FRESHNESSWAS A GIFTWELL PACKED AND DELIVERED IN TIME

reviews.review_title: When I ordered this product, there was free coffee ...
reviews.author_name: Geetha S..This pack was  manufactured  in 2017.And sent it as new product.Only one year is remaining.Pl take care to send new items  as it is a medicine.Thanks.
reviews.review_body: When I ordered this product,there was free coffee mug with this,but when I received, there is no coffee mug...Pl arrange to send it...Thank you.
Short expiry, Old manufacturing date Aug 18

reviews.review_title: Rush hour of a coffee lover
reviews.review_body: Are you a coffee lover who have no time to brew a coffee then this nescafe class coffee is for you. Instant coffee within 2min. Good quality,everything is fine . good product as expected
